Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Time that the agent processed the log. This is an optional field mainly useful for troubleshooting latency issues on the agent.
Columns.Name: TimeOfCommand

Columns.Description: Container ID for log source as seen by Docker engine.
Columns.Name: ContainerID

Columns.Description: Container Image for log source as seen by Docker engine.
Columns.Name: Image

Columns.Description: Used by Container solution only. Not populated by Azure Monitor for Containers.
Columns.Name: ImageTag

Columns.Description: Used by Container solution only. Not populated by Azure Monitor for Containers.
Columns.Name: Repository

Columns.Description: Unique name of the container the form  PODUid/ContainerName.
Columns.Name: Name

Columns.Description: Source of the log line. Possible values are stdout or stderr.
Columns.Name: LogEntrySource

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
